MS MCQs

    Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure App Service

    »

    1. What is the primary purpose of the App Service Migration Assistant?

      Update the code of ASP.NET and PHP websites to improve their compatibility with Azure services

      Move web apps already deployed to App Service to different geographical regions

      Move on-premises web apps deployed to IIS to App Service

      Provide training on how to migrate on-premises web apps to Azure


    2. For applications that use an on-premises SQL database, how can the Migration Assistant help ensure that your application remains connected to the database after the migration?

      Migrates the data to an Azure SQL database

      Copies the data to an in-memory database that runs on App Service

      Creates a hybrid connection to allow App Service to communicate with your on-premises database

      Creates a virtual machine running a copy of your SQL database


    3. Which of the following tasks might you need to perform yourself after using the Migration Assistant to migrate an application?

      Set up a custom domain name

      Start up the virtual machine running the site

      Assign the App Service instance to an App Service plan

      Upload a record of the migration to the Azure Migrate hub
